name: Test steps
fullName: QA TESTING Payment Complete Flow#Test steps
description:
**This request is a dummy request or an intializer request that is used to define the test flow**

We are defining test steps as data table with 3 columns "step" , "key" and "value"

**step** is an enum that accepts keywords like the requestname, assert and wait.

**key** and **value** are the information we use to drive the test like location strategy , variable to use , value to compare etc

```

pm.variables.set("testStep",

`
"step","key","value"
"new Session",null,null
"navigate To","url","https://www.saucedemo.com/"
"find Element","css selector","#user-name"
"element Send Keys","text","standard_user"
"find Element","css selector","#password"
"element Send Keys","text","secret_sauce"
"find Element","css selector","#login-button"
"element Click",null,null
"wait","seconds",2
"find Element","css selector",".title"
"get Title","pageTitle",null
"assert","title","PRODUCTS"
"get Element Text","title",null
"assert","pageTitle","Swag Labs"
"close Window",null,null
"new Session",null,null
"navigate To","url","https://www.saucedemo.com/"
"find Element","css selector","#user-name"
"element Send Keys","text","standard_user"
"find Element","css selector","#password"
"element Send Keys","text","secret_sauce"
"find Element","css selector","#login-button"
"element Click",null,null
"wait","seconds",2
"find Element","css selector",".title"
"get Element Text","title",null
"get Title","pageTitle",null
"assert","title","PRODUCTS"
"assert","pageTitle","Swa Labs"
"close Window",null,null
`
)



```
